column4: ok i had ubuntu installed for a while now. the reason i installed it was my xp installation was giving me problems ..now i've gotten around to finally reinstalling xp.. but i want to dual boot ubuntu too. my partition still exist i just can'yt boot into it now. can i do something with grub to be my boot manager again and mount ubuntu installtion that way i keep all my files and settings or...
...install ubuntu and keep file and settings
i'd like to get this done in the next 2 hours
